name: Super Quantum Gravity
description:
Thank you for taking the time to check out SQG, a short couch co-op top-down shooter for 2/4 players. Currently we have 2 characters with their own unique abilities and playstyles and 3 levels of progressing complexity. We'd love to hear your feedback!

Important Notes:

  • Game Controller Support Only
  • Currently at least 2 players required

If you encounter any issues/bugs please fire a quick email to nodandsmile.games@gmail.com
